name: BattleTanks (itch) (Openfun)
description:
Description

Take control of one tank from up to 64 to destroy your opponents and their base. Use your skills and tactics to dominate battle field. Increase your strength by killing your opponents and unlocking upgrades for your tank.

Features
  • Upgradable tanks
  • Fast paced & skill based
  • Tough oponents
  • Configurable battle size
Controls
  • Movement: WASD
  • Lock Rotation: Space
  • Fire1: LeftMouse
  • Fire2: RightMouse
  • Shield: E
  • Dash: Q

Please leave comment with anything that you would like to see in this game.
